mapper.select: select desti_no, desti_name, desti_lcinfo, desti_notes from destination de, company cp where cp.com_no = de.com_no and de.com_no = #{com_no}
mapper.insert: insert into destination(desti_no, desti_name, desti_lcinfo, desti_notes, com_no) values('DN'||to_char(systimestamp,'YYMMDDFF3')||dbms_random.string('x',3) ,#{desti_name},#{desti_lcinfo},#{desti_notes},#{com_no})
insert into company_closeday(com_no, comcl_date, comcl_dayweek,comcl_notes) values (#{com_no},#{comcl_date},#{comcl_dayweek},#{comcl_notes})
